shows.title: Greenbelt Run
shows.desc:
Inspired by parkrun, who organise free weekly runs in local parks around the world, Greenbelt Run is a 5km run around the beautiful grounds of Boughton House. Run, walk or jog: this isn't a race. It's a chance to meet other Greenbelters, see a bit more of the park and get some exercise. Some people will do it in under 20 minutes, while others will take the best part of an hour but you're guaranteed not to be last - a tail walker will walk at the back the whole route to make sure everyone is OK.
Meet at the Campsite Office in the main camping field for an 8:15am sharp start.
